page.title: 06Farming
page.content: The{farming}in the Tadcaster district is varied. There are seven farms included in the D-block which are very similar in character. Some farms keep{ {live-stock}such as sheep while others cultivate a lot of land for crops such as wheat, barley, oil-seed rape and sugar beet. Some areas of farmland have given way to plantations of young {trees}to encourage the growth of woods and forests. Other farms look after{ {poultry}such as turkeys which are fattened, killed and plucked for Christmas or Easter. The farms need a lot of machinery to take care of the large amount of land.
